attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that not enough is being done to protect children from peadophiles,a prison sentence,and the help of do gooders is not enough.
If you can't control your sexual urge,then it should be taken away.
Chemical castration is the only answer.and if ministers pity the abusers more then their young victims.then they are sending out the message that to abuse children is ok.
Or the powers that be in our country are protecting themselves from a more active sentence of castration.
Sarah's law should have massive backing from our ministers ,but is it?
Every caring parent should back this petition,for the sake of all the young babies upwards.
